entry.title: Monday: Showers. High 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers this morning. A few showers beginning this morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High 6. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Monday 1 May 2023
